individual_description: Portland and Tule Lake; resettled in Great Falls, Montana, May 1943

Second son famously challenged the curfew and exclusion in the courts.
Went to Portland and Minidoka and also served a nine-month jail sentence before resettling in
Denver.

Went to Pinedale and Tule Lake
with her two teen age children. Both children leave camp early and Peggie eventually joins
them in Chicago
In Manzanar with two youngest children more or less for the duration
